Bash("C:\Users\mayur\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python311\python.exe" -c "
try:
    from docx import Document
    doc = Document()
    doc.add_heading(''Sample DOCX Document'', 0)
    doc.add_paragraph(''This is a sample Word document for TinyForgeAI testing.'')
    doc.add_paragraph(''It demonstrates DOCX file ingestion capabilities.'')
    doc.save(''examples/files/sample.docx'')
    print(''Created sample.docx'')
except ImportError:
    print(''python-docx not installed, creating placeholder'')
    with open(''examples/files/sample.docx.txt'', ''w'') as f:
        f.write(''DOCX sample placeholder - install python-docx to create real file'')
")

Bash("C:\Users\mayur\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python311\python.exe" -c "
try:
    import fitz  # PyMuPDF
    doc = fitz.open()
    page = doc.new_page()
    text = ''Sample PDF Document\n\nThis is a sample PDF file for TinyForgeAI testing.\nIt demonstrates PDF file ingestion capabilities.''
    page.insert_text((72, 72), text, fontsize=12)
    doc.save(''examples/files/sample.pdf'')
    doc.close()
    print(''Created sample.pdf with PyMuPDF'')
except ImportError:
    try:
        from reportlab.lib.pagesizes import letter
        from reportlab.pdfgen import canvas
        c = canvas.Canvas(''examples/files/sample.pdf'', pagesize=letter)
        c.drawString(72, 720, ''Sample PDF Document'')
        c.drawString(72, 700, ''This is a sample PDF file for TinyForgeAI testing.'')
        c.drawString(72, 680, ''It demonstrates PDF file ingestion capabilities.'')
        c.save()
        print(''Created sample.pdf with reportlab'')
    except ImportError:
        print(''No PDF library available, creating minimal PDF'')
        # Create a minimal valid PDF manually
        pdf_content = ''''''%PDF-1.4
1 0 obj << /Type /Catalog /Pages 2 0 R >> endobj
2 0 obj << /Type /Pages /Kids [3 0 R] /Count 1 >> endobj
3 0 obj << /Type /Page /Parent 2 0 R /MediaBox [0 0 612 792] /Contents 4 0 R >> endobj
4 0 obj << /Length 85 >> stream
BT
/F1 12 Tf
72 720 Td
(Sample PDF Document for TinyForgeAI testing.) Tj
ET
endstream endobj
xref
0 5
0000000000 65535 f 
0000000009 00000 n 
0000000058 00000 n 
0000000115 00000 n 
0000000210 00000 n 
trailer << /Root 1 0 R /Size 5 >>
startxref
345
%%EOF''''''
        with open(''examples/files/sample.pdf'', ''w'') as f:
            f.write(pdf_content)
        print(''Created minimal sample.pdf'')
")
